description: "Although mainly of China and Japan, this map includes some of the northern parts of Southeast Asia. The map is dedicated to Sir Thomas Peyton, an English Member of Parliament who was imprisoned for supporting the king during the English Civil War."
label: "Singapore harbours and roads with the adjacent channels / cheifly from the surveys of Captn. Daniel Ross of the Bombay Marine, 1827 ; J. & C. Walker, sculpt."
